titles.title: Behold How Good A Thing It Is To Dwell (famili

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold how good a thing It is to dwell in peace How pleasing to our King This fruit of righteousness When brethren all in one agree They know the joy of unity They know the joy of unity{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When all are sweetly joined True followers of the Lamb They're one in heart and mind They think and speak the same When all in love together dwell The comfort is unspeakable The comfort is unspeakable{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where unity takes place The joys of heaven we prove This is the gospel grace The unction from above The Spirit on all saints is shed Descending swift from Christ our head Descending swift from Christ our head{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where unity is found The sweet anointing grace Extends to all around And consecrates the place To every waiting soul it comes And fills it with divine perfumes And fills it with divine perfumes{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}From Aaron's beard it rolls Those nearest to His face The humble trembling souls Who know abundant grace The grace the grace for all is free For lo it reaches now to me For lo it reaches now to me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On all His chosen ones The precious oil comes down Anointing as it runs Anointing on and on E'en to His skirts - the meanest name That longs to love the bleeding Lamb That longs to love the bleeding Lamb{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Grace every morning new And every night we feel The soft refreshing dew That falls on Hermon's hill On Zion it doth sweetly fall The grace of one descends on all The grace of one descends on all{/lang-eng}
